quest.name: Familiar Faces
journal: Alphinaud has a mind to start searching the Blue Window.
Alphinaud declares that you two should begin searching the isles in earnest for the Soleil. Follow him east and stand /lookout for the missing airship.
Though your vantage point affords an excellent view of the surrounding isles, you see nothing resembling the archbishop's airship. Proceed north and stand /lookout once more.

In the course of your search, you come upon a most unexpected sight: a unit of imperial troops surrounding a terrified Vanu Vanu. Before you can assess the situation, the troops mistake you for Ishgardians and attempt to seize you as well, apparently under the orders of “Lord van Hydrus.” With Alphinaud's help, you manage to defeat the Garleans, thus rescuing the Vanu prisoner.

Lonu Vanu, as he names himself, expresses his profound gratitude for your intervention. Though the presence of the imperials is an unfortunate development, the discovery that the Vanu here are not openly hostile to you and Alphinaud makes up for it.
objectives: Stand /lookout at the isle's eastern edge.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Assuming the Soleil is here, I doubt she will come to us. We should begin searching the isles in earnest...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of course, we must remain vigilant for Vanu scouts as well. I would rather avoid needless bloodshed.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: We'll keep the Enterprise here for now, but if you need to head back to Ishgard, you can use that standard to signal for an Ironworks airship.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Don't worry─we charted a route safe enough for others to fly...unless that primal shows up. But what are the odds of that, eh?

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: The Enterprise is ready to fly at a moment's notice. Just come running if you run afoul of something you can't handle.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: We'll stay in touch with your Temple Knight friend, don't you worry!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You search the skies for the Soleil, but see nothing resembling the missing airship.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Gods, look at them. So many isles...so many places to hide. No, we must not lose hope. He is out there, Forename─and we will find him.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Mayhap this effort was doomed to failure...

dialogue.name: LONUVANU
dialogue.text: (-???-)Begs mercy of netherlings! Does not fight! Does not wish to die!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Was that a Vanu being attacked? But by whom?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Over there!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Imperial troops!?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALLEADER01644
dialogue.text: Ishgardians!? Seize them! They'll know where the archbishop is!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The enemy of my enemy... We've no choice. With me, Forename! Protect the Vanu!

dialogue.name: LONUVANU
dialogue.text: Netherlings save Lonu Vanu from certain death! Showers netherlings with thanks like summer squall!

dialogue.name: LONUVANU
dialogue.text: Lonu Vanu knows not what wind bears netherlings to cloud sea, but warmly welcomes them! Shows gratitude where gratitude is due!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And so we live to fight another day...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Imperial troops? Here? Well, hopefully that's the last of them. We'll keep an eye out for others.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Protect the unarmed Vanu Vanu!

dialogue.name: CENTURIO
dialogue.text: Remember: Lord van Hydrus wants them alive! That's an order!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Lord van Hydrus? Regula van Hydrus!?

dialogue.name: CENTURIO
dialogue.text: What are you doing!? You're a disgrace to the VIth! Subdue these savages!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There's no end to them!

dialogue.name: OBIETAVANUVANU
dialogue.text: No weapons to fight netherlings! No desire to die!

dialogue.name: OBIETAVANUVANU
dialogue.text: Thunderous blows bring much pain! Blood flows, and does not stop! Blood flows!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Confound it...

dialogue.name: OBIETAVANUVANU
dialogue.text: Drifts...rises...no more pain...
